briefTitle: Study to Evaluate the Immunogenicity and Safety of an Investigational Influenza Vaccine for the Elderly
officialTitle: Immunogenicity and Safety Study of GSK Biologicals' Influenza Vaccine GSK2186877A in Elderly Adults.

interventions.name: GSK investigational FluNG vaccine GSK2186877A, aged lot
GSK investigational FluNG vaccine GSK2186877A, fresh lot

summary: The objective of the study is to evaluate immunogenicity between different formulations of GSK Biologicals' investigational vaccine GSK2186877A.

primaryOutcome.measure: Serum Haemagglutination-Inhibition (HI) Antibody Titers Against the 3 Vaccine Strains
